column1: Number and Rate(1), Reported Offences, Broadbeach Police Division, 01/01/2008 to 31/12/2012(2)
1. Rates are expressed per 100,000 persons and are calculated based on the estimated residential population as at 30 June of each year.
2. These data are preliminary and may be subject to change.
